name: Party Maze (pyroburger)
description:
Party Maze

The goal of Party Maze is to get to the opposite corner of the maze to get to the next level. Tiles will randomly turn red. Red tiles will kill the player on contact. A brief indication is given when a tile is about to turn red. The tiles are safe to move on as soon as they return to their default color. Each time you complete a level, more tiles will turn red at the same time for increasing difficulty. Use the wasd or arrow keys to move. Each maze is procedurally generated for a new challenge each time you play.
